product_name: Look PX 10 Wide Downhill Ski Bindings
long_description: The wide Look PX 10 Wide downhill ski bindings offer reliable protection from prerelease and unexpected falls. Toepiece provides multidirectional release for optimum protection in all types of falls; 4 contact points between the toepieces and the boots ensure effective power transfer. PX 10 wide bindings feature 45mm of elastic travel at the heel, which absorbs shock and allows a lower setting of release values. Anti-friction device reduces sliding between the boot and the binding and keeps release consistent. Look PX 10 Wide downhill ski bindings come with 100mm brakes, which are wide enough to fit most all-mountain skis.
